This is in fact a waste of your time and money. If your new to counter-strike, do yourself a favor and never buy this. New players are shunned and the community itself is as toxic as CS:GO. The only servers you will find are Gun Game and Deathmatch. At no point will you find a server that is fun to play or let alone that engaging. If I wanted to play against 13 yr olds that camp in a corner with a ak I would go buy COD. Granted I will give credit where its due, the gameplay is a breath of fresh air from the other fps games. But when the gameplay is over shadowed by its own toxicity then CS and its counterparts will not see a dime from me or anybody I play games with.

(Edit: "You shut the hell up younger me. The only reason why you wrote this was because you were salty from getting one tapped every time you spawned." My apologies for not doing this sooner. After spending some time hunting bots offline, I learned some spray control and decided to jump back into the online servers. But alas I didnt expect any change. You will still only find Gun Game , Deathmatch, Zombies, and Jailbreak. But now I dont shun away from the Deathmatch servers as they are pretty fun once you tell yourself you are gonna die... ALOT. Its a skill based game and it takes awhile to get used to. If your new dont give up hope and keep at it. So as of writing this review I do in fact recommend this game but with a warning to the new players. You will die alot, but just remember to keep calm and learn the game. If you need a more in deph tutorial, I advise you look at some of WarOwl's old CS:S videos.)

Counterstrike. Whether it's the original 1.6, CS:S or CS:GO, it keeps you coming back. But what's the appeal? The completely inane ballistics? The kids on voice chat who scream incoherently? The same maps over and over and over (de_dust2 for life)? That one guy who accuses you of hacking no matter what?

This is Counterstrike. No one knows, just play it.

I used to go to an internet cafe near my middle school in Sheepshead Bay, Brookyln, NY to play counter-strike. This was before Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 4 and Halo 4. It was before console games were capable of connecting you to the internet wirelessly and with better connections. It was before multi-player console gaming got better, and playing multi-play with a good connection meant playing PC games. Now, Counter-Strike Source is still fun to play, approachable, and I enjoy it more than a lot of those other games. 

I highly recommend this game. Especially if you are looking for a game that actually set the bar for the early 2000's when it came to what made a good multi-player game. A lot of the gameplay in today's FPS multi-player games came from this game. It holds up well for this reason, though today's FPS multi-player games have since added new elements to gameplay. For example Call of Duty: Ghosts multiplayer lets you do percs and includes support items like gunship support lol. I find that to be both cool but also unneccessary. This game is good for getting back to basics. You can play with just bots for practice, controling their difficulty & weapons, playing online is fun especially with custom tags, and beware of people who use cheats or have a lagging online connection (happens from time to time) best thing to do is to just leave. 

There is no single player campaign, if you are looking for something like that in Counter Strike series, get Counter-Strike: Condition Zero-Deleted Scenes. The campaign is really good and predates CoD:Modern Warefare series but has a similar feel. If you do decide to get this game, get the regular game Counter Strike: Condition Zero too. It lets you customize your squad members and each mission plays like normal Counter Strike session but adds objectives that act like win conditions. Online is really a ghost town, but if you are looking for a strong singleplayer experience in this series, get Counter Strike: Condition Zero and its included companion Counter Strike: Condition Zero-Deleted Scenes. 

9/10 I love this game for nastalgia's sake! Even today playing online or offline never gets old. Does not have any singleplayer campaign like Counter-Strike: Condition Zero-Deleted Scenes, and there can be some minor issues when playing online. Despite minor speed bumps this game is an awesome FPS game. No gaming library should be without it.
The prequel definitley beats the original here people. huge improvement. 10/10 valve

Игра вышла в далёком 2004 году и на текущий момент она предлагает:
1) Отвратительную физику стрельбы, в которой попадания фиксируются через раз, проходя сквозь хитбокс.
2) Горы бесполезного оружия, чья эффективность равна нулю в большинстве ситуаций.
3) Китайские светошумовые и дымовые гранаты, срабатывающие 2 раза из 3.
4) Значительное количество игроков на серверах использующих антифлэш и квадратики.

Сравнивая с другим недошутером (CS:GOvno), можно отметить следующие положительные моменты:
1) Awp - лучше, чем когда либо. Имба оружие, которое на всех никчёмных и жлобских российских серверах ограничено и доступно только за деньги. 250-300 рублей за возможность играть с awp - это сильно.
2) Модели оружия всё ещё можно менять, как и спрэй, не платя за это ни копейки.
3) Играет приличное количество людей, всегда можно найти сервер по душе.
4) Читеров сравнительно меньше, чем в популярных шутерах, что, несомненно связано с меньшим числом людей.

最早接触CS是在11年，在360保险箱里下载的一个叫CS1.6使命召唤迷你版，那个时候只知道这个版本的枪很酷
后来我又在360保险箱里发现了CS起源，玩了半个小时，感觉自己要吐了，原来CS还有比1.6更好看更好玩的版本啊—人物阴影，布娃娃系统，画质没得说(虽说是04年的游戏，比某线强好吧)
总之它改变了我对那个纸模型CS的看法
一年后，我突发奇想，在百度上搜索了“CS起源完整版”这几个字，印入眼帘的全是2G+大小的起源，当时家里没有网线，我就去学校前门下载，每下一次就要花十块钱，后来我沉浸在与bot战斗的乐趣中，渐渐的我认识了一群人，学会了怎么替换模型，知道了什么是steam
CS起源是15年圣诞节买的，也是我人生买的第一款正版游戏，如今我认识了很多朋友，他们和我一样担心它的未来，我也成为了一个天天剁手的sbeamer
This game has the best physics in my opinion, always love coming back to CS:Source for some surfing and bhoping. 9/10
